item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: kenta
item.content:encoded: Welcome to Kenta Sites. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: kenta
item.content:encoded:
This may be a good place to introduce yourself and your site or include some credits. You can also promote your core products or services to your target market.

Our Vision

This section can outline the fundamental purpose of the company's existence (what problem it solves/what need it fulfills).

Our Values

3-5 core values (e.g., innovation, integrity, customer-centricity). Team culture (e.g., flat management structure, remote work, employee benefits).

Our Story

Introduce the founder's background (e.g., professional experience, entrepreneurial motivation), the opportunity that sparked the venture (e.g., market gaps, personal pain points, or societal issues), early challenges (funding, technology, team building, etc.), and key turning points.
